title: Publish token-optimizer skill to ClawHub
description:
## Objective
Prepare and publish the token-optimizer skill to ClawHub for public release.

## Current Status
- ✅ Skill packaged: `/root/.openclaw/workspace/clawhub-release/token-optimizer.skill` (24.7KB)
- ✅ All 4 scripts tested and working
- ✅ CLAWHUB.md listing description created
- ⏳ Awaiting Git repo creation
- ⏳ Needs final README with author details

## Deliverables
1. **Git Repository Setup**
   - Create repo (Architect will provide access)
   - Push skill files with proper structure

2. **Documentation**
   - README.md with install instructions
   - Add author: M Asif Rahman
   - Add credits: Matrix Zion team
   - License: MIT

3. **Final Package**
   - Verify all scripts work
   - Test `openclaw skill install token-optimizer.skill`
   - Ensure proper metadata in SKILL.md frontmatter

4. **ClawHub Submission**
   - Submit to clawhub.com
   - Verify listing appears correctly

## Files Location
- Skill: `/root/.openclaw/skills/token-optimizer/`
- Package: `/root/.openclaw/workspace/clawhub-release/token-optimizer.skill`
- Listing: `/root/.openclaw/workspace/clawhub-release/CLAWHUB.md`

## Features (for listing)
- Context optimization (50-80% reduction)
- Smart model routing (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus)
- Communication enforcement
- Heartbeat optimization
- Cronjob optimization
- Budget tracking

## Estimated Savings
- Single agent: $1,248/mo → $237/mo (81%)
- 100 customers: $101K/mo saved
